properties.displayName: Scripted Diagnostics Turn Off Check Enabled - Registry
properties.query:
DeviceRegistryEvents
| where RegistryValueData =~ "DWORD (0x00000001)" and RegistryKey endswith "\\Policies\\Microsoft\\Windows\\ScriptedDiagnostics\\TurnOffCheck"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects enabling TurnOffCheck which can be used to bypass defense of MSDT Follina vulnerability
